= User Guide =

== Installation == 

=== Download the binary ===

Just launch this command line:

{{{
 wget http://ttc-project.googlecode.com/files/ttc-term-suite-1.0.jar
}}}

=== Compilation from Sources ===

Just launch these command lines:

{{{
 svn checkout http://ttc-project.googlecode.com/svn/tags/1.0 ttc-term-suite
 cd ttc-term-suite/modules
 for module in * ; do cd $module ; mvn install ; cd .. ; done
 cd ..
 mvn -f pom-term-suite.xml package
}}}
